mapper.select: select f.relation_id, f.user_id, u.username, u.number, u.avatar_url, n.content from friends f join users u on f.user_id = u.user_id join notifications n on n.related_id = f.relation_id where f.friend_id = #{userId}

select f.relation_id as relationId, f.friend_id as friendId, f.status as relationStatus, u.username, u.number, u.avatar_url as avatarUrl, u.status as userStatus from friends f join users u on f.friend_id = u.user_id where f.user_id = #{userId} and f.status = 1
